entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @SteveFDA We wont take a vaccine if @realDonaldTrump  says it safe. He said Covid-19 is 99% harmless. We will believe nothing about a vaccine until someone shows some integrity.
